1.2 Implementation of all measures and controls
FREQUENCY: Prior to commencing any activity
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: All necessary measures and controls are being implemented, that is: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS & WP
REFERENCE DOCUMENTS: PSP, EMP, TMP, JSEA, SWMS, WP
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Subsurface drainage pipes: (behind bluestone wall) 100mm DIA Class 1000kN/m/m corrugated perforated plastic pipe- with a perforation size of maximum 1.5mm width and minimum length of 150 mm per m^2.
○ Subsurface drainage pipes: (in soft landscaping area) 300mm wide megaflo
○ Granular filter material for bedding and backfill: Trench backfilled and bedded with specified material on drawings (clean washed coarse sand for megaflo, 20mm screenings for behind bluestone wall)
○ Flushout risers: constructed to the detail of SD 1631
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off, Delivery dockets, product spec sheets etc.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: An excavation permit must be issued prior to any excavation commencing.
○ Plant and equipment shall be appropriate for the task.
○ Excavation operations shall not disturb areas outside the limit of excavation

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bottom of trench shall be compacted and at a depth no more than 50mm below the specified pipe invert. Grade of the base of the trench shall not allow ponding of water Any loose material shall be removed.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: This ITP signed off
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Bedding of granular filter material, sand or screenings placed across bottom of trench and screeded or graded to level
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: ITP Signed, Photos
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Pipes placed centrally in trench and held firmly in place positioned with openings at the lower half of the pipe.
○ If geofabric required as per Cl 3030.07 (subsurface drains installed in expansive materials), minimum 150mm lap of geotextile used for wrapping.
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: ITP Signed, Photos

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Granular filter material placed and compacted compacted in layers not exceeding 300mm with minimal disturbance to pipes. Concrete is to be placed and compacted within one hour of mixing
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: ITP Signed, Photos
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Installed in accordance with drawings and Cl 702.10
RECORD OF CONFORMITY: ITP Signed, Photos

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: The position of all pits are to be confirmed with the superintendent.
